channel.title: bryan-vandenbrink on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in bryan-vandenbrink on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am an MSc student in the Integrative Biology department at the University of Guelph. My advisors are Karl Cottenie, Shoshanah Jacobs, and Ian Hogg. I am currently on education leave from Polar Knowledge Canada where my job title is Science Ranger. My responsibilities include assisting and expediating research projects on behalf of visiting researchers to the Canadian High Arctic Research Station.
